sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"计算"之意。
means: calculate ： 通常指要求细致精确和复杂的计算，以解决疑难问题，多用于自然科学、生产部门或要求专门计算的场合。
count ： 指逐一计算而得出总数。
compute ： 一般指已有数据的，较简单但数字长的数学运算。
reckon ： 通常指较简单的数学计算，也可指心算。

sentence.Network_en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy.
sentence.Network_cn: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

sentence.Network_en: Use the formula to calculate the volume of the container.
sentence.Network_cn: 用公式计算容器的容积。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin calculat- 'counted', from the verb calculare, from calculus 'a small pebble (as used on an abacus')

entry.def: If you calculate a number or amount, you discover it from information that you already have, by using arithmetic, mathematics, or a special machine.

example.ex: From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy...
example.tran: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

example.ex: We calculate that the average size farm in Lancaster County is 65 acres...
example.tran: 我们计算出兰开斯特郡的农场面积平均为65英亩。

entry.def: If you calculate the effects of something, especially a possible course of action, you think about them in order to form an opinion or decide what to do.

example.ex: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately...
example.tran: 我觉得我能准确预料此事的政治后果。

example.ex: The President is calculating that this will somehow relieve the international pressure on him.
example.tran: 总统预计这可以从某一方面缓解自己所承受的国际社会压力。

means.word_mean: 1. make a mathematical calculation or computation
5. specifically design a product, event, or activity for a certain public

sentences.sentence: "you can count on me to help you any time"
"Depend on your family in times of crisis"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可计算的, 能预测的
stems_affixes.word_buile: calculate[v.计算,推算;计划,打算]+able能……的→adj.可计算的, 能预测的
re重新+calc石头+itrant表形容词→重新变成石头→顽固的
calc石头+ium表名词,常指化学元素→n.钙[化学符号Ca]
calculate[v.计算,推算;计划,打算]+or物器→n.计算机, 计算器
calc石头+ul+ate表动词→古时用小石计数

Sentence.sentence: They also calculated the cost savings emerging from the amount of disease that would be avoided because of lower blood pressure.
But when all those factors are put together and the economists calculate the numbers, it ends up being a net positive, but a small one.

means.word_mean: 计算, 估计, 核算

sentences.en: I calculated that the trip would take two days.
sentences.cn: 我估计这段路程要走两天时间。

sentences.en: I'll calculate what it will cost.
sentences.cn: 我要估计一下那要花多少钱。

sentences.en: The scientist could not calculate when the spaceship would reach the Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 那位科学家没有算出那艘宇宙飞船什么时候会到达木星。

sentences.en: Astronomers can calculate when there will be eclipses of the sun and moon.
sentences.cn: 天文学家可以算出何时发生日食和月食。

sentences.en: Emotional people don't stop to calculate.
sentences.cn: 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑。

sentences.en: This advertisement is calculated to attract the attention of housewives.
sentences.cn: 这个广告旨在吸引家庭主妇们的注意力。

sentences.en: The speech was calculated to win votes.

jushi.english: The boy is only three but he can already calculate to fifty.
jushi.chinese: 这孩子虽然只有3岁,但已经能数到50了。

jushi.english: That book calculates as a masterpiece.
Emotional people don't stop to calculate.
jushi.chinese: 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑。
